topic: french farmers force their way through paris with tractors to protest free trade deal

text: French farmers are protesting a newly proposed free trade deal
The protest involves hundreds of farmers from across the country
They are objecting to the agreement's provisions on agricultural imports
The farmers claim the agreement will lead to cheap imports and unfair competition
The protest has been largely peaceful, with some minor skirmishes
Several arrests have been reported, and motorists are being urged to avoid the area
The city's authorities are working to maintain order and minimize disruptions
The French government is being called upon to respond to the farmers' demands
Analysts suggest the protests could be just the beginning of a long debate
The future of French agriculture hangs in the balance
The protests are a dramatic show of force by the farming community
The farmers are determined to make their voices heard
The situation continues to unfold, with uncertainty about the outcome
The world is watching as the French government responds to the crisis
